channel.title: Help with .P files
channel.description:
i just got this server source and the char. files are .P files, why? it is a 667/718 server i think, im relatively new to codeing servers so im starting with a working one to fool around with. i want to be able to edit and give rights and owner to a username, please help.. ive tried looking into how the files are saved and couldent find it. what should i do? if u want to skype me with help that would be really appreciated thanks.
is anyone else haveing problems with .P files?

item.title: Help with .P files
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

What the .p file is the server doing save(player.getUsername() + “.p”); the .p does not mean anything assuming you’re using Matrix based server. The file is saved in binary format but text editors like notepad replace every 8 bits with a symbol to represent them so that it takes up less space?

If you want to be able to edit the files you’ll either have to program something that can read and modify the data or change the way the files are saved so that you can read it in plain English.

Read full topic
